content: the height of the buttonhole-band of the right shoulder from rs using the circular needle 3 mm/us2 5 pick up and knit 7 sts from the short edge of the buttonhole-band pick up and knit across 25/27/29/31/37 sts from the back pick up and knit 9 sts from the left shoulder join to the bound off sts of the front pick up and knit 21/23/25/27/33 sts from the bound off sts of the front neck pick up and knit 7 sts along the short side of the button-band turn work row 1 ws p1 k1 repeat - until 1 st rem p1 row 2 rs work in rib-pattern as established in row 1 row 3 ws create buttonhole work in rib-pattern as established until 5 sts remaining bind off 2 sts work to end in rib-pattern as est row 4 rs work 3 sts as est cast on 2 sts work as established to end work 2 more row in rib-pattern as established bind off from ws in rib-pattern break and secure yarn the left sleeve sts are picked up and knit around the armhole opening starting from the shoulder-join the sts are picked up from rs 1 st from the edge using a circular needle recommended or dpns using mc and a dpn or the first half of a circular needle if working the magic loop size 3 mm/us2 5 pick up and knit 25/27/30/33/37 sts from the underarm to the shoulder-join using the second dpn or the second half of the circular needle pick up and knit 25/27/30/33/37 sts from the shoulder-join to the underarm pm bor you have 50/54/60/66/74 sts in the round continue work in stripe-pattern using the same method to avoid the jog as used for the lower body rounds 1 3 using cc sm k all sts to the end of round rounds 4 5 using mc sm k all sts to the end of round repeat rounds 1 5 when work measures 4 cm/1 5 measured from the 1st round of the sleeves start decreases decrease round sm k1 ssk k until 3 sts rem from marker k2tog k1 2 sts decreased continue work in stripe-pattern as est repeat decrease round every 3 5/3/3 5/3/2 5 cm = 1 5/1 25/1 5/1 5/1 a total of 3/4/5/7/11 times including the first repeat and until you have 44/46/48/52/52 sts rem continue work in stripe-pattern as est and without further decreases until work measures 12/15/20/24/27 cm = 4 5/5 75/7 75/9 5/10 5 measured from the underarm end at bor break cc the cuff using mc and starting from bor sm k1 p1 repeat - to end of round work 3 more rounds of rib-pattern as est above bind off all sts in rib-pattern break and secure yarn 7 the right sleeve start by overlapping the buttonhole-band and button-band with rs facing place the buttonhole-band of the back on top of the button-band of the front so that they lie completely on top of each
